ParticipatingSecuritiesDistributedAndUnd.description: Amount of earnings (loss) distributed and earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

PartnersCapitalAccountAcquisitions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Acquisitions
PartnersCapitalAccountAcquisitions.description: Change in the different classes of partners' capital accounts during the year due to acquisitions. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Distributions
PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.description: Total distributions to each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountOptionExercise.label: Partners' Capital Account, Option Exercise
PartnersCapitalAccountOptionExercise.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to option exercise. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Public Sale of Units
PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnits.description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a public offering.

PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Redemptions
PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to redemptions and adjustments to redemption value. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountSaleOfUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Sale of Units
PartnersCapitalAccountSaleOfUnits.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to the sale of units. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitBasedCompensat.label: Partners' Capital Account, Unit-based Payment Arrangement, Amount
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitBasedCompensat.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in partners' capital account for unit-based payment arrangement issued by partnership. Partner includes, but is not limited to, general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSoldInPublicO.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Sold in Public Offering
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSoldInPublicO.description: The number of units sold in a public offering of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalIncludingPortionAttributa.label: Partners' Capital, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
PartnersCapitalIncludingPortionAttributa.description: Amount of partners' capital (deficit), including portions attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

PartnersCapitalOther.label: Partners' Capital, Other
PartnersCapitalOther.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in partners' capital classified as other.

PaymentOfFinancingAndStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payment of Financing and Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentOfFinancingAndStockIssuanceCosts.description: The total of the cash outflow during the period which has been paid to third parties in connection with debt origination, which will be amortized over the remaining maturity period of the associated long-term debt and the cost incurred directly for the issuance of equity securities.

PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.label: Payments of Capital Distribution
PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.description: Cash outflow to owners or shareholders, excluding ordinary dividends. Includes special dividends.

PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Common Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Noncontrolling Interest
PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends provided by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.label: Payment, Tax Withholding, Share-based Payment Arrangement
PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.description: Amount of cash outflow to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

PaymentsToAcquireAdditionalInterestInSub.label: Payments to Acquire Additional Interest in Subsidiaries
PaymentsToAcquireAdditionalInterestInSub.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of noncontrolling interest during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Gross
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period. The cash portion only of the acquisition price.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Equity Method Investments
PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of or advances to an equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

PaymentsToAcquireInterestInSubsidiariesA.label: Payments to Acquire Interest in Subsidiaries and Affiliates
PaymentsToAcquireInterestInSubsidiariesA.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of or advances to an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled (for example, an unconsolidated subsidiary, affiliate, and joint venture or equity method investment) or the acquisition of an additional interest in a subsidiary (controlled entity).

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInConso.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Interest in Consolidated Subsidiaries
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInConso.description: The cash inflow associated with the deconsolidation of a previously consolidated subsidiary or the sale of investment in consolidated subsidiaries (generally greater than 50 percent).

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartn.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Limited Partners Units
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartn.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common limited partners units during the period.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash inflow from contractual arrangement with the lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.label: Proceeds from Noncontrolling Interests
ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash inflow from a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, purchase of additional shares or other increase in noncontrolling interest ownership.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForTradingSecurities.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Trading Securities, Short-term
ProceedsFromPaymentsForTradingSecurities.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from sales and purchases of trading securities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Available-for-sale Securities
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Equity Method Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.description: The cash inflow from the sale of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

ProceedsFromStockOptionsExercised.label: Proceeds from Stock Options Exercised
ProceedsFromStockOptionsExercised.description: Amount of cash inflow from exercise of option under share-based payment arrangement.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.label: Property Subject to or Available for Operating Lease, Accumulated Depreciation
PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.description: The amount of accumulated depreciation, by major property class, recorded on property subject to or available for lease as of the balance sheet date.

PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.label: Property Subject to or Available for Operating Lease, Gross
PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services subject to or available for lease.

PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.label: Property Subject to or Available for Operating Lease, Net
PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.description: The amount of property, by major property class, net of accumulated depreciation, subject to or available for lease as of the balance sheet date.

ReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Receivables, Net, Current
ReceivablesNetCurrent.description: The total amount due to the entity within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from outside sources, including trade accounts receivable, notes and loans receivable, as well as any other types of receivables, net of allowances established for the purpose of reducing such receivables to an amount that approximates their net realizable value.

RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCa.label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Carrying Amount
RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCa.description: As of the reporting date, the aggregate carrying amount of all noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. This item includes noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) regardless of the type of equity interest (common, preferred, other) including all potential organizational (legal) forms of the investee entity.

RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of an obligation from a lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryi.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Current
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryi.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsNoncurre.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Noncurrent
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsNoncurre.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as noncurrent. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RestrictedStockExpense.label: Restricted Stock or Unit Expense
RestrictedStockExpense.description: Amount of noncash expense for award of restricted stock or unit under share-based payment arrangement.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SalesRevenueGoodsNet.label: Sales Revenue, Goods, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueGoodsNet.description: Aggregate revenue during the period from the sale of goods in the normal course of business, after deducting returns, allowances and discounts.

SalesRevenueServicesNet.label: Sales Revenue, Services, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueServicesNet.description: Aggregate revenue during the period from services rendered in the normal course of business, after deducting allowances and discounts.

SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockIssued1.label: Stock Issued
StockIssued1.description: The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.

TradingSecuritiesRealizedGain.label: Trading Securities, Realized Gain
TradingSecuritiesRealizedGain.description: This item represents the gain realized during the period from the sale of trading securities.

TradingSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.label: Trading Securities, Realized Gain (Loss)
TradingSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of gain (loss) realized from securities classified as trading.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of derivative instruments, including options, swaps, futures, and forward contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership Units Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership Units Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Used in the calculation of diluted net income or loss per limited partnership unit.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.
